info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 17 at 8:39PM CDT until March 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee...
South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson
For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson.
* WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Businesses along Westover Road are affected by flood waters.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 34.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Monday was 34.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 34.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING
